text: When I saw that body coming out of the water, I yelled, "That's me... me. Everyone looked at me in amazement, but I kept saying, "That's me... that's my wristwatch with an extensible bracelet... that's me". - It's me! - I shouted at them and they didn't listen to me, because they didn't understand how I could be the one who brought the drowned river that morning. FIN
title: ¡Ese soy yo!
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
